The biggest difficulty 3G Contracting faces is maintaining its cash flow.  After being denied a loan at a commercial bank due to insufficient credit history, Travis came to ACCION Texas-Louisiana for financing.  This loan is helping Travis and his partner move two of their part-time employees to full-time, as well as helping them acquire another pickup truck for the business. 3G Contracting has five employees, three of whom will now be working full-time. 

Running the business from a home office, Travis’ wife handles 3G Contracting’s administrative and clerical duties.  With Travis and his wife both working full-time for the company, 3G Contracting supports four families.  3G Contracting’s goal for this year is to increase revenues by 30%.  

Check out the website at www.3gcontracting.com.

loans.use: to hire full-time employees and acquire vehicle for business.

loans.name: Luz Y Prosperidad 2 Group

texts.en:
Ana runs a small business of selling medicines and shoes. She has operated her walking store for over 2 years and her loans have allowed her to increase her business. She plans to use this loan to buy slippers, women's sport shoes and general medicines (headache, fever, pain and others).

She has successfully repaid her first loans and this will be her second one with Esperanza. Ana has three grown children and she is a widowed woman. She wants to continue to increase her business by investing her profits and saving.

Ana is the group coordinator of her group Luz y Prosperidad (Light and prosperity) 2. Her story is representative of both her group and of Esperanza's Dominican and Haitian clients (many of whom have recently immigrated to the DR). The group is based in Los Alcarrizos, a dusty industrial town.

loans.use: to buy shoes and medicine

loans.name: Elvira Natividad

texts.es:
Elvira Natividad H. A. tiene 29 años, es soltera vive  con la madre y el padre y los hijos (2), en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Elvira se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca también tienen gallinas los productos los compra en  Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos y alimento para sus aves.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es trabajar muy duro para tener dinero para sus hijos ya que no tienen papa y ella tiene que ver la manera que no les falte nada.

Le gusta ayudar a mis hijos hacer la tarea.
texts.en:
Elvira Natividad H. A. is 29 years old.  She is single and lives with her mother and father and her two children in the Chillanes canton in the province of Bolívar.

The members of the La Soledad communal bank are located in Recinto El Tambo in Chillanes canton.  This communal bank has 12 members who work in agriculture, growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca, and raising birds such as chickens and ducks.

Elvira farms, growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca.  She also has chickens.  She buys her products in Chillanes and El Tambo, and sells them at the fair on Sundays in Chillanes.

She is asking for the loan to buy supplies for her crops, fertilizers, and food for her birds.  The loan will help her economically to supply her with necessities, and also to face challenges such as infestations, illnesses, and variations in climate.  Her dream is to work very hard to have money for her children, since they have no father, and she has to find a way to give them everything they need.

She likes to help her children with their homework.

loans.use: to purchase crop supplies, fertilizers, and food for her birds

loans.name: Edita

texts.es: Edita tiene 54 años de edad y es soltera sin hijos. Vive con sus padres, hermanos y sobrinos en una casa familiar ubicada en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz cerca de la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Su comunidad es urbana y está en vías de crecimiento. Edita se dedica a confeccionar ropa como pantalones y casacas en una empresa que produce ropa deportiva. Actualmente, la casa de Edita se encuentra en un estado deteriorado. Desea hacer unas reparaciones y también comprar muebles. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles. Con los cambios a su casa, podrá brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus padres ancianos y otros familiares. Anteriormente, cuando Edita necesitaba acceder crédito, recurría a prestamistas informales los cuales le cobraban tasas altísimas. Edpyme le ofrece su crédito a una tasa de interés más baja que otras entidades bancarias y los prestamistas informales. Eso le permitirá a Edita trabajar tranquilo sin perjudicar su liquidez diario.
texts.en: Edita is 54 years old, single, and has no children.  She lives with her parents, siblings and nephews in the family's house, located in the José Leonardo Ortiz district near the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.  Her community is urban and is growing rapidly.  Edita works making clothing such as pants and jackets for a sportswear company.  Edita's house is currently in a deteriorated state.  She wants to make some repairs, and also buy some furniture.  To do this, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 Peruvian soles.  With these changes to the house, she will be able to provide a better quality of life for her elderly parents and other family members.  Previously, when Edita needed to access credit, she relied on informal moneylenders who charged very high interest rates.  Edpyme offers her loan at an interest rate that is lower than that offered by other financial institutions and the informal lenders.  This will allow her to work without having to worry about high interest rates that would use up a lot of her daily earnings.

loans.use: to make some repairs to her house and to buy some furniture

loans.name: Ángel Santos

texts.es:
Ángel Santos R. M. tiene 36 años, es soltero vive con un  hijo  de 15 años, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Ángel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y naranja los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para dejar de herencia a los hijos.

Le gusta salir con el hijo hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Ángel Santos R. M. is 36 years old.  He is single and lives with his son, who is 15 years old, in Chillanes canton in Bolívar province.

The members of the La Soledad communal bank are located in Recinto El Tambo in Chillanes canton.  This communal bank has 12 members who work in agriculture growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca.  They also raise birds such as chickens and ducks.

Ángel farms, growing cacao, rice, corn, yucca, and oranges.  He buys his products in Chillanes and El Tambo, and he sells his products at the fair on Sundays in Chillanes.

He is asking for the loan in order to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers.  The loan will help him economically to supply his necessities and to face challenges such as infestations, illnesses, and variations in climate.  His dream is to buy land in order to leave his children an inheritance.

He likes to go out with his son to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers

loans.name: Gerardo Alex

texts.es:
Gerardo Alex L. V. tiene 22 años, es soltero vive con los padres, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Gerardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es mejorar el negocio y cosechar mas.

Le gusta ayudar a los padres en las labores de la casa.
texts.en:
Gerardo Alex L. V. is 22 years old.  He is single and lives with his parents in Chillanes canton of Bolívar province.

The members of the La Soledad communal bank are located in Recinto El Tambo in Chillanes canton.  This communal bank has 12 members who work in agriculture growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca.  They also raise birds such as chickens and ducks.  

Gerardo farms, growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca.  He buys his products in Chillanes and El Tambo, and he sells his products in the fair on Sundays in Chillanes.  

He is asking for the loan to buy supplies for his crops, as well as fertilizers.  The loan will help him economically to supply his necessities, as well as to face challenges such as infestations, illnesses, and variations in climate.  His dream is to improve his business and harvest more.  

He likes to help his parents with the household chores.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers

loans.name: Alberto Yasmany

texts.es:
Alberto Yasmany M. R. tiene 30 años, es soltero vive con los padres, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Alberto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es que los padres estén con el para cuando se vaya a casar.

Le gusta ver la televisión y acompañar a los padres.
texts.en:
Alberto Yasmany M. R. is 30 years old.  He is single and lives with his parents in the Chillanes canton in Bolívar province.

The members of the La Soledad communal bank are located in Recinto El Tambo in Chillanes canton.  This communal bank has 12 members who work in agriculture growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca.  They also raise birds such as chickens and ducks.

Alberto farms, growing cacao, rice, corn, and yucca.  He buys his products in Chillanes and El Tambo, and he sells his products at the fair on Sundays in Chillanes.

He is asking for the loan to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers.  The loan will help him economically to supply his necessities, as well as to face challenges such as infestations, illnesses, and variations in climate.  His dream is that his parents will be with him when he gets married.  

He likes to watch television and keep his parents company.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers

loans.name: Heidy Milena

texts.es: Heidi y es una joven muy emprendedora que vive con sus padres y hermanos  en uno de los barrios mas alegres y autóctonos de la ciudad de Barranquilla y desde allí se dedica a la fabricación de almohadas, colchas y cojines; Heidy pertenece a una familia muy unida y aprendió de su padre esta actividad  desde que tenia 12 años; ella recuerda como en ese momento empezó  su proceso de comprensión del emprendimiento y el aprendizaje de este digno oficio. Su principal satisfacción es cortar, preparar y ensamblar piezas, mediante la costura, para lograr productos de un gran acabado. De esta manera Heidy consigue olvidarse de las pocas posibilidades de empleos empresariales que existen y se dedica a producir para obtener sus ingresos y esto la hace estar muy feliz, disfrutando de lo que le gusta y especialmente por estar unidad cada día mas a su familia. Este es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual logrará mejorar la cubierta de su negocio,  para evitar el reflejo del caliente sol y la impredecible lluvia; así mismo comprará tela y esponja  en un mayor volumen, porque requiere elaborar sus delicados productos. Así mientras continua trabajando y  su margen de rentabilidad no es inferior del 30%, su sueño principal se centra en tener una sala de exhibición con todos los productos que fabrican, pensando en un futuro no muy lejano tener su vivienda de dos plantas, para independizar el espacio familiar del productivo.
texts.en: Heidy is a very entrepreneurial young woman who lives with her parents and siblings in one of the most cheerful and indigenous neighborhoods in the city of Barranquilla.  From there, she makes pillows, bedspreads, and cushions.  Heidy belongs to a very united family, and she learned this activity from her father from the time she was 12 years old.  She remembers how at that time she began the process of understanding the enterprise and learning this noble work.  Her principal satisfaction is cutting, preparing, and assembling pieces, through sewing, in order to achieve high-quality products.  In this way, Heidy has been able to forget about the few opportunities that exist for jobs in business.  She produces in order to earn her income, and this makes her very happy.  She enjoys doing something she likes, especially because she is becoming closer with her family every day.  This is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and she will use it to improve her business' roof in order to avoid the reflection of the hot sun and the unpredictable rain.  She will also buy cloth and foam in greater volume, because she needs it to make her delicate products.  While she continues working in this way and her profit margin is not less than 30%, her principal dream centers around having a showroom with all the products she makes.  Thinking of a future that is not so far away, she wants her house to have two stories, in order to separate family space from work space.

loans.use: to improve her business' roof and to buy cloth and foam in greater volume

loans.name: Javier Manuel

texts.es:
Javier Manuel M. C. tiene 27 años, es soltero vive con los padres y un hijo, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Javier se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y plátano los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para el futuro del hijo.

Le gusta salir con los padres y el hijo a caminar.
texts.en:
Javier is 27 years old, single, and lives with his parents and a son in Chillanes canton, Bolivar province. The members of the “La Solidad” (Solitude) communal bank are located in the El Tambo region of Chillanes canton. The bank has 12 members, all dedicated to agricultural labor, cultivating cacao, rice, corn, and yuca, and raising  fowl such as hens and ducks.

Javier is a farmer who plants cacao, rice, corn, yuca, and bananas. He buys his supplies in Chillanes and El Tambo, and he sells his products at the Sunday fair in Chillanes.

Javier is requesting a loan to buy crop supplies in addition to fertilizers and manure. With the help of the loan, he will be able to supply his economic necessities, confronting challenges such as plagues, diseases, and changes in climate.  

His dream is to buy a piece of land for his son's future. He likes to go for walks with his parents and his son.

loans.use: TO BUY SUPPLIES FOR HIS CROPS INCLUDING FERTILIZER AND MANURE

loans.name: Lider Hermognes

texts.es:
Lider Hermognes R. M. tiene 33 años, es soltero vive con los padres y un hijo, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Lider se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca, plátano, soya los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es educar al hijo y ver que sea un buen profesional.

Le gusta ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Lider Hermognes R. M. is 33, single, and he lives with his parents and a son in the Chillanes canton, Bolivar province.

The members of the communal bank La Soledad are in  El Tambo which is part of the Chillanes canton.  This branch has 12 members who are farmers and they grow cacao, rice, corn, and yucca as well as raise poultry such as hens and ducks.

Lider farms and plants cacao, rice, corn, yucca, plantains and soy beans which he buys in Chillanes and in El Tambo and sells at the Sunday market in Chillanes.

He is requesting a loan to buy products for cultivation such as fertilizer and manure.  With the financing he will be able to have the help he needs.  He fights problems such as infestations and disease and the variations in the weather.  His dream is to educate his son and see that he becomes a professional.

Lider likes to watch television.

loans.use: To buy products for farming such as fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: José Javier

texts.es:
José Javier M. S. tiene 19 años, es soltero vive con los padres, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y cría chanchos los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos y comida para los chanchos con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajando para ayudar a mis padres.

Le gusta conversar con los padres.
texts.en:
Jose is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Chillanes canton, Bolivar province.

The members of “La Soledad” (Solitude) communal bank are located in the El Tambo region of Chillanes canton. The bank has 12 members, all dedicated to agricultural labor, cultivating cacao, rice, corn, and yuca, and in addition, raising fowl such as hens and ducks.

Jose is a farmer who sows cacao, rice, corn, and yuca, and raises pigs. He buys his supplies in Chillanes and El Tambo, and sells his products in the Sunday fair at Chillanes.

Jose requests a loan to buy crop supplies, including fertilizers and manure, and feed for his pigs. With the help of the loan, he will be able to supply his economic necessities, and confront challenges such as crop plagues and diseases, and variations in climate.

His dream is to continue working in order to help his parents. He likes to converse with his parents.

loans.use: TO BUY CROP SUPPLIES, INCLUDING FERTILIZERS AND MANURE, AND FEED FOR HIS PIGS

loans.name: Claudio Valeriano

texts.es:
Claudio Valeriano R. O. tiene 70 años, es soltero vive con un nieto de 14 años, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Claudio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz,  los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es trabajar.

Le gusta ver televisión y acompañar al nieto hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Claudio Valeriano R. O., age 70, is single.  He lives with his 14 year old grandson in Chillanes Canton of Bolivar province.  

The members of the La Soledad communal bank live in the El Tambo area in the Chillanes Canto.  This communal bank’s 12 members grow cacao, rice, corn and cassava, as well as raising poultry such as chicken and ducks. 

As a farmer, Claudio grows cacao, rice and corn.  He buys products in Chillanes and El Tambo and sells them in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Claudio is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies like natural and chemical fertilizers for his crops.  The loan will help him financially to meet his needs.  He faces challenges likes pests, crop diseases and weather changes.   His dream is to work.   
He likes to watch television and take his grandson to play sports.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and natural and chemical fertilizers

loans.name: Climaco Wilfrido

texts.es:
Climaco Wilfrido M. R. tiene 37 años, es soltero vive con los hijos, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Climaco se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz,  los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo para el negocio.

Le gusta salir con el hijo hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Climaco Wilfrido M. R. is 37 and single.  He lives with his children in Chillanes Canton of Bolivar province.  

The members of the La Soledad communal bank live in the El Tambo area in the Chillanes Canto.  This communal bank’s 12 members grow cacao, rice, corn and cassava, as well as raising poultry such as chicken and ducks. 

As a farmer, Claudio grows cacao, rice and corn.  She buys products in Chillanes and El Tambo and sells them in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Claudio is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies like natural and chemical fertilizers for his crops.  The loan will help him financially to meet his needs.  He faces challenges likes pests, crop diseases and weather changes.   His dream is to buy a vehicle for his business.   

He likes to go out with his son.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like natural and chemical fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Stalin Euclides

texts.es:
Stalin Euclides C. B. tiene 40 años, es soltero vive con el hijo, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Stalin se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz,  los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa para el hijo.

Le gusta jugar indor con los vecinos.
texts.en:
Stalin Euclides C. B. is 40 years old, single, and lives with his son in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

'La Soledad' community bank is located in El Tambo, in Chillanes canton.  The group has 12 members who all work in agriculture, growing crops such as cacao, rice, corn and cassava.  They also raise birds such as hens and ducks.

Stalin is a farmer who grows cacao, rice and corn.  He buys his products in Chillanes and El Tambo and sells his products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Stalin is requesting this loan to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his work such as pest infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to buy a house for his son. 

Stalin enjoys playing indoor soccer with his neighbors.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Guido Bartolo

texts.es:
Guido Bartolo Z. H. tiene 41 años, es soltero vive con los hijos, en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Guido se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz,  los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es educar a los hijos.

Le gusta salir de paseo con los hijos.
texts.en:
Guido Bartolo Z. H. is 41 years old, single, and lives with his children in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

'La Soledad' community bank is located in El Tambo, in Chillanes canton.  The group has 12 members who all work in agriculture, growing crops such as cacao, rice, corn and cassava.  They also raise birds such as hens and ducks.

Guido is a farmer who grows cacao, rice and corn.  He buys his products in Chillanes and El Tambo and sells his products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Guido is requesting this loan to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his work such as pest infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to educate his children.

Guido enjoys going out for walks with his children.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Tierra Fertil 4 Group

texts.en:
Yolanda is a member of the “Tierra Fertil 4” (Fertile Land) group. A single mother, her family is composed of her three children who she works very hard to sustain and educate. Yolanda tells us that her most difficult challenges have been, and always will be, supporting her children both economically and educationally.

Yolanda has had her business for about a year, having started it with savings after acquiring skills in a beauty center school. She is very excited about getting her first Esperanza Internacional loan and will use it to buy manicure and nail products, allocating her additional profits to business expansion.

Yolanda lives in one of the Los Alcarrizos communities, a very active city with a large population that goes about the streets creating a very busy city. It is located west of the city of Santo Domingo and, like many other cities, lacks many basic services.

loans.use: to buy manicure and nail products

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio Cesar C. P. tiene 30 años, es soltero vive con los hijos (3), en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  LA SOLEDAD se encuentra ubicada en el recinto EL TAMBO  pertenece al Cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 12 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas de cultivos de cacao, arroz, maíz, yuca y además cría aves como gallina y patos.

Julio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz,  los productos las compras en Chillanes y en El Tambo y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos además de fertilizantes y abonos con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar carro.

Le gusta jugar con los hijos y salir los fines de semana.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar C. P. is 30 years old, single, and lives with his three children in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

La Soledad community bank is located in El Tambo, in Chillanes canton.  The 12 members of this group work in agriculture, growing crops such as cacao, rice, corn and cassava.  They also raise birds such as hens and ducks.  Julio is a farmer who grows cacao, rice and corn.  He buys his products in Chillanes and El Tambo and sells his products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

Julio is requesting this loan to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his work such as pest infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to buy a car.

Julio enjoys playing with his children and going out on weekends.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Lisbeth

texts.es:
La señora Lisbeth es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y tienen 2 hijos.  Su esposo es profesor (docente).
Lleva 10 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, todos estos años se dedicó a la venta de mercadería diversa y es la presidenta del banco comunal, siempre ha solicitado los préstamos de acuerdo a sus necesidades, para poder cumplir con los pagos mensuales y no caer en mora.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/.2,000.00 comprará 20 pares de sandalias, 3 docenas de polos para hombres, ½ docena de pantalones, 1 docena de shores.
Todas los préstamos son invertidos en su negocio, de esta forma se adastece conmercadería que luego vende a mejor precio.
Dice que con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos ha podido hacer algunos arreglos en su casa y por eso está muy contenta porque trabajando ha podido lograr mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lisbeth is a member of the "Nuevas Amigas" (New Friends) community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 36 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Her husband is a teacher.

Lisbeth has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for 10 years.  During this time she has worked selling a range of merchandise and she is the president of her community bank.  She has always requested loans in accordance with her need so that she can meet her monthly repayments and not default.  She will use her new loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles to buy twenty pairs of sandals, three dozen men's polo shirts, half a dozen pairs of pants and one dozen pairs of shorts.

Lisbeth invests all of her loans in her business.  She stocks up with merchandise which she then sells at a better price.  She says that her loans from Manuela Ramos have also enabled her to make some repairs to her home and she is very happy about this because it means that, through her work, she has been able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, sandals, etc.

loans.name: Nuevo Progreso 1 Group

texts.en:
Felicia is the coordinator of her group Nuevo Progreso (New Progress) 1 and her story is representative of the other members of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally.

Felicia´s group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo, they live in the north of the main city, where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home in a simple structure with her husband and they have six grown children. Her most difficult challenge was to have her own little home and she wants to live tranquil and safe in it. She enjoys to do her favorite activity 'business'.

Felicia is excited to be taking out her sixth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business running a colmado, or small general store, by stocking rice, beans, cooking oil, spaghetti, sauces, canned products and flour. She will use the profits to re-invest in her business. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, cooking oil, sugar and flour

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 56 años, es casado, y tiene dos hijos (de 23,21 años).Pertenece al banco communal "Lila" de FINCA Peru. Solicita un crédito de S/. 1 600.00 Nuevos Soles. Se dedica a la venta de jugo de naranja.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de una maquina de raspadilla a electricidad.
Alejandro antes se dedicaba a la venta de comida en el mercado Carlos F. Vivanco y decidió vender jugos. Este trabajo lo realiza todos los días desde las 8:00 a.m..a 6:00 p.m. en el Puente Nuevo y le va bien. Alejandro también atiende eventos especiales como: matrimonios, bautizos, y fiestas patronales, donde prepara comida.
Está en FINCA Perú casi 10 años, y ingreso por la invitación de una amiga. Le gusta FINCA Peru porque dice que es de confianza, puede ahorrar, además recibe capacitación en diferentes temas. Ahora está ahorrando para poder comprarse su terreno y construir su casita. Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 56 years old, married, and has two children aged 23 and 21.  He is a member of FINCA Peru's "Lila" community bank.  Alejandro is requesting a loan for 1,600 Peruvian soles.  His business is selling orange juice.  He will invest his loan in buying an electric snowcone machine.

Alejandro used to sell food in Carlos F. Vivanco market then decided to start selling juice.  He carries out his business every day, from 8.00am to 6.00pm, in El Puente Nuevo and it is doing well.  He also prepares food for special events such as weddings, christenings and patron saints' days.

Alejandro has been working with FINCA Peru for nearly 10 years.  He was invited to join by a friend.  He likes FINCA Peru because he says that they are trustworthy and he can save money.  He also receives training on different topics.  Right now, Alejandro is saving up so that he can buy a plot of land and build his own home.  His dream is for his children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy an electric snowcone machine

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es: Aníbal David O. vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 2 y 4 años, en el barrio Villa del Carmen del municipio de Soledad; allí tiene un negocio mediante el cual ofrece servicios de mantenimiento de equipos de cómputo y comercializa mercancía variada, que además de permitirle generar ingresos, le ayuda a poner en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos en el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje  SENA, empresa estatal  en la que se capacitó técnicamente.  De este negocio depende su familia y lo creó por la necesidad de empleo e independencia propia de su naturaleza y en él trabaja para hacerlo crecer.  Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con ello lo  surtirá de mercancías,  como camisas,  suéteres, gorras,  dispositivos para computador como mauses,  teclados y  parlantes.  Su sueño y también desafío es tener un punto comercial en grandes superficies  y  tener su casa propia, mientras trabaja persistentemente para  aumentar su capital de trabajo, así como sus ventas e incrementar sus utilidades para reinvertirlo y hacer de su negocio un gran almacén.
texts.en:
Aníbal David O. lives with his partner and two children, aged 2 and 4, in Villa del Carmen neighborhood, in the town of Soledad.  There he has a business where he carries out computer repairs and sells a variety of merchandise which also allows him to make income.  He puts into practice the knowledge he acquired from the Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje - SENA (The National Training Service) where he received technical training.  His family depends on this business which he set up as he needed a job and independence.  He works to grow his business.

Aníbal's Kiva loan is the first loan he has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and he will use it to stock up with merchandise such as shirts, sweaters, caps and computer peripherals such as mice, keyboards and speakers.  His dream, and also his challenge, is to have a sales location inside a large store and to own his own home.  In the meantime, he works persistently in order to increase his working capital and his sales.  He also works to increase his profits so that he can reinvest them and make his business grow.

loans.use: to buy computer peripherals such as mice, keyboards and speakers and to stock his business with shirts, sweaters and caps

loans.name: Virginia Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Virginia es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 54 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos
Es una D. las primeras socias D. este banco comunal que ya tiene 10 años D. creación y sigue trabajando para poder ayudar a su esposo con la carga familiar, tiene 2 hijos que todavía dependen D. ellos.  Virginia se dedica a la compra y venta D. gallinas D. chacra que las trae desD. los caseríos donD. va cada 15 días.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 3,000.00 comprará 30 gallinas, 15 patos, 10 gallos, para luego llevarlos al mercado y venderlos a un buen precio, su mercadería es D. la chara a la olla.
Hasta ahora ha tenido una vida tranquila a lado D. su familia y espera seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos por más tiempo, sus hijos le ayudan con los cuidados D. sus animales.
texts.en: La señora Virginia is a member of the communal bank "Nuevas Amigas" from the district of Calleria, in the Department of Ucayali.  She is 54 years old and marreid with three children.   She is one of the founding members of this communal bank which is ten years old.  She continues working to help her husband with the family necesities (they still have two dependent children.)  Virginia makes a living buying and selling hens she brings from the villages she visits every two weeks.  With her new loan of 3,000 will buy 30 hens and 15 ducks to bring to the market to sell at a good price.  Her merchandise is from the pond to the pot.  Up to now, she has had a quiet life besiD. her family and she hopes to keep working with Manuela Ramos.  Her children help her care for her animals.

loans.use: To buy hens and ducks.

loans.name: Tereza

texts.en: Tereza is a talented cook and hardworking mother who came to the United States from Ecuador to create a more prosperous life for her family.  This will be her fourth loan from Grameen America to support her ambition of cooking and selling traditional Ecuadorian food.  Tereza used her first three loans to successfully grow her food cart business, where her most popular dishes include chicken, potatoes and empanadas.  Tereza will use her latest Grameen America loan to acquire space and purchase inventory to open a grocery store.  Running her own store will not only help Tereza earn greater profits, but it will also allow her to work regular Monday through Friday hours, instead of working all weekend like she does at the food cart.  This is especially important given how devoted Tereza is to her four children and her nine nieces and nephews.

loans.use: To purchase inventory and the rent space she needs to open a grocery store

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, tiene 44 años, es conviviente, con tres hijos(de 16,12,3 años). Pertenece al Banco Comunal Lila.
Solicita un crédito de S/. 3 000. Tiene un multiservicios (librería).
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de una fotocopiadora.
Norma es de profesión ingeniero civil, realiza trabajos de evaluación de predios, saneamiento físico legal de terrenos, declaratoria de fabrica, también cuenta con un Multiservicio (librería) ubicada frente a Registros Públicos en Ayacucho.
Está en FINCA Perú, desde el 2006, le agrada porque es una entidad crediticia sólida de garantía y  solvencia. Se practica mucho los valores, les enseñan a ahorrar y pasa momentos gratos con sus con socias.
Su meta es tener una ferretería y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Norma is 44 years old.  She lives with her partner and has three children aged 16, 12 and 3.  She is a member of the 'Lila' community bank.

Norma is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles.  She has a 'multi-service store' and she will invest her loan in buying a photocopier.

Norma is a civil engineer by profession.  She does evaluation work and submits legal paperwork regarding building work on plots of land.  She also has a 'multi-service store' which is located opposite the land registry office in Ayacucho.

Norma has been working with FINCA Peru since 2006.  She likes it because it is a solid, reliable credit company which promotes values, teaches its members to save and allows them to spend some pleasant moments with the other members.

Norma's dream is to own a hardware store and for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene 36 años, vive al lado de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa que es propia. El trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de animales, entre ellas el de porcino y ovino, actividad que lo realiza desde hace 4 años y 8 meses. Su negocio lo ejecuta de la siguiente forma, compra estos animales de ganaderos que los ubica en las zonas rurales; y luego son vendidos cada fin de semana, de esta manera se genera ingresos semanales. Su esposo la ayuda en este trabajo, juntos consiguen los animales para comprarlos, además considera más rentable el negocio cuando vende la carne de estos que vivos.  Por otro lado, ella  trabaja cuidando niños en su casa, ocasionalmente cuando alguno de sus vecinos le solicita este servicio, en ocasiones su madre la reemplaza en el trabajo ganadero para vender algún animales que algún cliente necesita. Ella se siente muy satisfecha con su actividad, y más cuando hay épocas de festividades ya que tiene mucha demanda de reses, cerdos y ovejas. Ahora su mayor propósito es tener más capital de trabajo. Es su crédito número 19 con MFP, se siente muy agradecida se pertenecer a su banco comunal  y considera a cada uno de sus integrantes se han convertidos en sus amigos, ya que ellos siempre han sido solidarios y donde le enseñaron el significado del ahorro. Con el crédito que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de más cerdos e incrementar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Angélica is a hardworking 36 year old who lives with her husband and two children in the home they own. She has sold animals (pigs and cows) for a living for 4 years and 8 months. This is how her business operates: she buys the animals from ranchers who live in rural areas and then sells them on the weekend. In this way, she generates weekly income. Her husband helps her with this work. They both get the animals and then sell them. They also find it more profitable to sell the meat from the living ones. On the other hand, she occasionally works taking care of children in people's homes when her neighbors ask her to. Sometimes her mother takes her place in the cow business to sell some animals a customer needs. She is very happy with her work and on holidays when there is a high demand for beef, pork, and lamb. Currently, her greatest challenge is working capital. This is her 19th loan with MFP and she is very grateful to belong to her communal bank and feels that her companions have become friends since they have always shared solidarity and they have taught her to save. She will invest the loan she is taking out to buy more pigs and increase her working capital.

loans.use: Comprar cerdos.

loans.name: Alma Leticia

texts.es:
La señora Alma Leticia C., tiene un hijo que actual mente esta estudian y que esta bajo la responsabilidad. 
Doña Alma Leticia tiene un negocio de venta de ropa y accesorios de belleza, desde hace ya más de un año. 
Al negocio le esta haciendo falta mas variedad de mercancía y desea vender aparatos eléctricos y productos para bebes. Pero en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la inversión, es por eso que solicita un préstamo el cual pagara con una parte de las ganancias que obtenga de las ventas del negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
texts.en: La señora Alma Leticia C. has a son who is currently studying and is her responsibility.  Doña Alma Leticia has had a business selling clothing and beauty supplies for over a year now, which needs to diversify its merchandise.  She also wants to sells electric appliances and products for babies, but right now she doesn't have the money to invest.  This is why she is taking out a loan which she will repay with some of her sales earnings, which is her family's source of income.

loans.use: To invest in her business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, tiene 29 años, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos (de 10, 7, 6 años).Pertenece al banco comunal Lila.
Solicita un crédito de S/. 1000.00
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderías para su carretilla. 
Norma tiene una carretilla en la puerta del Zoológico de la Universidad Nacional San Cristóbal de Huamanga, donde vende galletas, caramelos, chicles, aguas gaseosas, papitas y agua mineral.
Norma comenzó a trabajar desde que su pareja la dejo, eso le ayudo a ser fuerte y a trabajar por sus hijos. Ingreso a FINCA Perú por la invitación de su cuñada. Tuvo algunas dificultades le robaron, pero sigue adelante. Le gusta FINCA Perú, por los ahorros y las capacitaciones que recibe. Ahora está ahorrando para comprarse un terreno. Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Norma is a 29 year-old single mother of 3 children, aged 10, 7 and 6.  She belongs to the communal bank "Lila."

She is requesting a loan of 1,000 Peruvian soles.  She will invest this loan in the purchase of merchandise for her food cart.

Norma has a food cart at the entrance of the zoo at the National University of San Cristóbal de Huamanga, where she sells cookies, caramels, chewing gum, soft drinks, chips and mineral water.  

Norma started to work when her partner left her.  This helped her to be strong and to work for her children.  She joined FINCA Peru at the invitation of her sister-in-law.  She has had some difficulties, she was once robbed, but she persisted with the business.  She likes FINCA Peru because she can save money and she also receives training there.  Now she is saving to buy some land.  Her dream is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her food cart

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia tiene 47 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace 20 años que ha trabajado en el comercio, y hasta el momento lo considera como su principal fuente de ingresos, hoy ha implementado un pequeño restaurante en el mismo local donde ejecuta sus ventas. Con ayuda de su esposo y la de sus dos hijos, vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad desde golosinas hasta lo de primera necesidad, así como atienden a sus clientes que acuden a su establecimiento de comida. Recuerda que en un inicio vendía en una pequeña caseta, ahora su local esta ubicado en el interior de su casa, permitiéndole mayor comodidad en su negocio. Su negocio le es muy rentable, ya que su casa esta ubicada cerca de un paradero de buses, y tanto el personal del transporte como los pasajeros son los que van a consumir a su negocio. Por ello desea ampliar su tienda y abastecerse de mercadería. Es su crédito número 19 con MFP,  tiene un buen concepto del crédito grupal aunque en muchas ocasiones en su grupo hayan existido  dificultades que han fortalecido la confianza  en su banco comunal y que hoy renueva su compromiso de seguir siendo muy puntual en sus cuotas. En esta ocasión seguirá invirtiendo como compra más productos para implementar su tienda, asimismo desea ayudar a su esposo con la reparación de un vehiculo que posee.
texts.en:
Celia is 47 years old and lives with her husband and three children in her own home.  She has been working as a saleswoman for 20 years and she has considered it to be her main source of income up until now.  Celia currently has a small restaurant set up in the same premises from which she makes her sales.  With the help of her husband and two of her children, she sells all types of products, from candy to essentials.  They also serve the customers who come to eat in her restaurant.

Celia reminisces that she used to make her sales from a small stall but now her premises are located inside her home which gives her more comfort in carrying out her business.  Her business is very profitable as her home is located near a bus stop and both the staff who work on the buses and the passengers come to her business.  For this reason, she would like to expand her store and stock it with merchandise.

This is Celia's 19th loan from MFP and she has a good concept of how group loans work.  Although there have been many occasions when her group have experienced difficulties, these have strengthened her confidence in her community bank and today she is renewing her pledge to continue being punctual in making her repayments.  On this occasion, Celia will continue investing in her business by purchasing more products in order to stock her store.  She would also like to help her husband to repair a vehicle that he owns.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her store and to repair her husband's vehicle

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es:
La señora Genoveva es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 57 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 6 hijos mayores D. edad.
Lleva 10 años con la familia D. Manuela Ramos, ella se dedica al servicio D. costura, cuando es época D. colegio es cuando tiene más pedidos.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 6 metros D. tela, 2 kilos D. retazos, 1 docena D. cierre, ½ docena D. botones, 1 cinta satinada.
Su esposo es empleado público y tiene que estar siempre midiéndose en los gastos del hogar para hacer alcanzar el dinero.  Gracias a éste negocio ella pueD. solventar algunos gastos del hogar.  Agradece a Manuela Ramos por los préstamos y sobre todo por las charlas educativas que dan a las socias.
texts.en:
Genoveva is a member of the "Nuevas Amigas" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 57 years old, married, and has 6 grown-up children.

Genoveva has been working with the Manuela Ramos family for 10 years.  Her business is sewing and she has most orders during the school season.  She will use her new loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles to buy 6 meters of fabric, 2 kilos of remnants, one dozen sets of fasteners, half a dozen sets of buttons and one lot of satin ribbon.

Genoveva's husband is a public employee and they always have to balance their household expenses carefully in order to make the money stretch.  Thanks to her business, Genoveva is able to cover some household expenses.  She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for her loans and, above all, for the educational talks that they give to their members.

loans.use: to buy fabric and fasteners wholesale

loans.name: Azucenas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AZUCENAS” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes y tiene como presidenta a la señora Rosario.   Los negocios de las señoras son diferentes, entre ellos tenemos: venta de dulces, pastelería, chiflería, venta de medias, tejidos de chompa, joyería, taller de electricidad, venta de ladrillos.

La señora Rosario, presidenta de la asociación comunal, indica que participa hace un año en una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer. En la actualidad la tiene un negocio de joyería que trabaja hace 3 años, inicviando este negocio con su hermana.

El crédito que sacará ahora es para la compra de oxigeno, oro y otras erramientas, posterior a la elaboración de sus joyas las saldrá a vender a diferentes ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concuvinato y tiene un hijo. 

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación.
texts.en:
The Azucenas Community Bank will be starting its second loan cycle with Pro Mujer as a part of the Villa Exaltación headquarters. This group is comprised of 8 members, and its president is Ms. Rosario. These women have different business, selling things like candy, cakes, natural remedies, stockings, hand-woven sweaters, jewelry, and bricks. One member has an electrician shop.

Ms. Rosario, president of the group, states that she has been a part of the community bank with Pro Mujer for a year. She currently owns a jewelry making business, which she has had for three years. She started this business with her sister.

The loan that is being requested will be used to purchase oxygen, gold, and other tools necessary to make jewelry, which she will sell at different markets. This job allows her to generate the funds she needs to support her family, since she has a live-in partner and a son.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the training.

loans.use: to purchase oxygen, gold, and other tools necessary for jewelry making.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Señor Francisco M. y la señora Guillermina tienen dos hijos que actual mente están estudiando.
Solicitan un préstamo para poder comprar una computadora que sus hijos están necesitando para realizar las tareas e investigaciones que les encargan en la escuela, porque en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para poder comprar la necesidades que sus hijos necesitan para estudiar. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo de constructor de viviendas, ya que su esposa la señora Guillermina Sánchez quien trabaja en una fábrica en el aria de producción le ayudara con los gastos de la familia. 
Desean que sus hijos tengan una mejor educación y  lo necesario para que puedan terminar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Mr. Francisco M. and Ms. Guillermina have 2 children who are currently in school.

They are requesting a loan in order to purchase a computer because their children need one to do the homework and research projects that they are assigned at school. At this time, he does not have the money necessary to purchase what his children need in order to study.

He plans on repaying the loan with the income that he obtains as a home construction worker. His wife, Guillermina Sánchez, works in the production department of a factory and will help with the family expenses.

He hopes that his children will receive a better education and everything they need so that they can finish their degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a computer for his children.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Zarela

texts.es:
La señora Zarela es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 años, está casada y tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar.
Son 2 años que está trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos y tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de gaseosas y golosinas, cuenta con una vitrina pequeña para colocar sus productos.  Su esposo se desempeña como empleado público y como es sabido que el sueldo es muy bajo, Zarela colabora con un ingreso más para los gastos de la casa.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,900.00 nuevos soles comprará 3 jabas de gaseosa, 2 cajas de galleta, 1 caja de chicle, 1 bolsa de caramelo, 5 tiras de chizitos, 2 tiras de chupetín, 2 tiras de maní tostado.
De esa manera, trabajando es que las mujeres han sabido salir adelante, porque dan todo por su familia, cualquier sacrificio por parte de los padres para dar bienestar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ms. Zarela is a member of the Nuevas Amigas community bank in the Calleria district of the department of Ucayali. She is a 40-year-old married mother of two school age children. She has been working with loans from the Manuela Ramos microfinance institute for two years, and she runs a small business in which she sells soda pop and candy. She owns a small display case to place her products. Her husband is a public worker, a job that is known to pay a low salary. Zarela collaborates with this extra income to cover the household expenses.

With this new 1,900.00 PEN loan, she will purchase 3 crates of soda pop, 2 boxes of cookies, 1 box of chewing gum, 1 bag of candy, 5 units of cheese puffs, 2 units of lollipops, and 2 units of roasted peanuts.

Working is how women have been able to get ahead because they give their all for their family. Parents make whatever sacrifice they need to for the well-being of their children.

loans.use: to purchase soda pop, cookies, and other snacks.

loans.name: Paola Fernanda

texts.es:
La Señorita. Paola V. es socias del banco comunal Fe y Alegría, vive por el sector del Tiempo en la ciudad de Cuenca que  es de clima frió pero su gente es muy calida, es la tercera ciudad con más importante del país  y  fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad por su gran belleza arquitectónica.

La Señorita Paola tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres quienes tienen casa propia, su papá es chofer de profesión y su mamá comerciante.
 
Nuestra socia es de profesión Cosmetóloga y hace 3 meses empezó a trabajar ejerciendo su profesión. Ella tiene un local propio en el cual realiza tratamientos de belleza, labora de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo.
 
Es socia del  banco comunal hace año y medio, el dinero de su crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cremas fáciles, mascarillas y más productos para su local.

Su meta es tener su propio Spa.
texts.en:
Ms. Paola V. is a member of the Fe y Alegría (Faith and Joy) community bank. She lives in the Tiempo sector of the city of Cuenca, where the climate is cold but the people are very warm. This city is the third most important in the country, and has been named a cultural heritage site for its architectural beauty.

Ms. Paola is a 20-year-old single woman who lives with her parents, who are homeowners. Her father works as a driver while her mother is a merchant.

Our client is a cosmetologist who got started 3 months ago. She has a business space in which she gives beauty treatments, working from Monday through Saturday without a fixed schedule.

She has been a member of the community bank for a year and a half, and will use the money to purchase face cream, facial masks, and other products for her business.

Her goal is to open up her own spa.

loans.use: to purchase face cream, facial masks, and other beauty products.

loans.name: Trancito Piedad

texts.es:
La Señora Trancito T. es socia del banco comunal Fe y Alegría, vive en la parroquia  Baños, esta localidad  es conocida por sus piscinas de aguas termales las cuales son muy calientes, por la variedad de lugares turísticos y centros de diversión,asì como  por su gastronomía y calidez de su gente.

La Señora Trancito tiene 43 años, vive en unión libre y tiene 4 hijos de 25, 23, 20, 16 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos son casados e independientes, su tercera hija trabaja y ayuda en la economía del hogar y su ultimo hijo estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo es jubilado por invalidez por un derrame que sufrió hace algún tiempo, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Trancito se dedica a la venta de comida la cual la realiza en su casa, labora de lunes a viernes solo el medio día y lleva en este negocio 2 años.
 
Este es  su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en el pago del arriendo de un local que rentò para ampliarse con su negocio y vender mucho más sus deliciosos platos.

Su meta es tener un restaurante.
texts.en:
Ms. Trancito T. is a member of the Fe y Alegría (Faith and Joy) community bank. She lives in the Baños parish, which is well known for its hot springs, its tourist spots, its entertainment centers, its cuisine, and its people's warmth. 
Ms. Trancito is a 43-year-old woman with a live-in partner and 4 children ages 25, 23, 20, and 16. Her two eldest children are married and independent. Her third daughter works and helps with the household expenses, while her youngest son is attending a local school. Her husband has retired due to a disability caused by a hemorrhage that he had some time ago. They do not own a house, which is why they have to rent.  
Ms. Trancito sells foods in her home, working at noon from Monday through Friday. She has been in business for two years. 
This is her fourth loan from the community bank, and she will invest it in renting a business space so that she can increase sales and sell more of her delicious dishes. 

Her goal is to open up a restaurant.

loans.use: to pay the rent on a leased home

loans.name: Rosario Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosario C. es socias del banco comunal Fe y Alegría, vive por el sector del Cristo del Consuelo en la ciudad de Cuenca la cual es de clima frió pero su gente es muy calida, es la tercera ciudad  más importante del país y  fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad por su gran belleza arquitectónica.

Doña Rosario tiene 52 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 32, 30, 20 y 14 años de edad, su primera hija es soltera y  de profesión tecnóloga medica que trabaja y le ayuda  economícamente, su segundo y tercer hijo son casados e independientes y su ultimo hijo  estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo se dedica a la venta de artefactos de limpieza, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
La Señora Rosario labora en la atención de un bar de una escuela, labora de lunes a viernes solo medio día y lleva 3 años en esta actividad.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 10 años y su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos como bocadillos, gaseosas, golosinas, etc. para el bar de la escuela.
 
Su meta es tener un negocio propio como un almacén de artículos para la limpieza.
texts.en:
Ms. Rosario C. is a member of the Fe y Alegría (Faith and Joy) community bank. She lives in the Cristo del Consuelo sector in the city of Cuenca, which has a cold climate, but its people are very warm. This city is the third most important in the country, and has been named a cultural heritage site for its architectural beauty.

Ms. Rosario is a 52-year-old married mother with 4 children, ages 32, 30, 20, and 14. Her eldest daughter is single, works as a medical technician, and helps her financially. Her second and third children are married and independent, while her youngest son is studying at a local school. Her husband sells cleaning supplies for a living, and with their joint efforts, they have been able to build their own house.

Ms. Rosario minds a school snack bar half the day from Monday through Friday. She has been in business for 3 years.

She has been a member of this community bank for 10 years and will invest this loan in purchasing goods like snacks, soft drinks, candy, etc. for the snack bar.

Her goal is to have both her own business and a warehouse for cleaning supplies.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, soft drinks, candy, etc.

loans.name: Ethel

texts.es:
La señora Ethel es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 64 años D. edad, es viuda y es madre D. 10 hijos.
Son 10 años que lleva perteneciendo a la familia D. Manuela Ramos, tiene una ferretería que a base D. mucho esfuerzo saco adelante, para poder educar a sus hijos, que todavía estaban en su poder.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 4 llantas para carro, 4 aros D. carro, 4 cámaras.
Tiene un negocio muy bien implementado, el local  es alquilado pero con las ventas pueD. pagar el alquiler sin ningún problema y también las letras D. Manuela Ramos.
La ayuda que Manuela Ramos da a las socias D. los bancos comunales es muy importante porque D. esa manera pueden ampliar su negocio y otras pueden empezar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Ms. Ethel is a member of the Nuevas Amigas community bank in the Calleria district of the department of Ucayali. She is a 64-year-old widowed mother of ten. She has been a member of the Manuela Ramos family for 10 years. She owns a hardware store, which she has been able to push ahead after much effort in order to educate her children who are still under her care.

With this new 2,000.00 PEN loan, she will purchase 4 car tires, 4 rims, and 4 inner tubes.

She has a well-stocked business in a rented space. However, she is able to cover both the rent and her Manuela Ramos repayments with her profits without a problem. The help that Manuela Ramos gives the members of the community banks is very important because this way, some women can expand their businesses, while others can start get started on their dreams.

loans.use: to purchase tires and tire accessories.

loans.name: Maria Socorro

texts.es:
María tiene 46 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Vive en casa propia,  en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

La actividad que desarrolla el titular es la costura y manualidades que ella misma elabora ya que cuenta con una máquina de coser en la cual realiza sus confecciones. También se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral como pavos y gallinas los cuales engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 3 años en la parte posterior de casa. 

María desea comprar telas e hilos para la costura de ropa y la compra de alimentos. Es por ello, en el afán de seguir creciendo en su negocio ha creído conveniente obtener un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles de Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Maria is a 46-year-old married mother of two. She lives in her own home in the Tambogrande district, an agricultural zone located in the Piura region, over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

Our client is in the sewing and handicraft business. She herself makes her products since she has a sewing machine with which to make them. She also raises poultry--turkey and chickens--which she fattens then sells at the local market. She has been raising poultry behind her house for 3 years.

Maria would like to purchase fabric and thread to sew clothing, and she would like to purchase feed. For this reason, in an effort to keep expanding her business, she thinks that it is appropriate to request a 1,000.00 PEN loan from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, and chicken feed.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.es:
Elmer  tiene 37 años, es soltero y reside junto a su familia en la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del Departamento de Lambayeque.

Elmer brinda servicios de transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, un vehículo que consiste de una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior.  Como ya es conocido, cuenta con clientela muy fidelizada que lo apoya y elige su servicio.

Elmer desea realizar algunas mejoras a su vehículo que es su herramienta de trabajo. Asimismo desea comprar algunos accesorios que necesita para mantener su moto en buenas condiciones y seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio. Con la ayuda de un préstamo, espera aumentar sus ingresos y hacer algunos arreglos en su domicilio. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Elmer is 37, single, and lives with his family in the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque Department.
Elmer offers a passenger transportation service with his mototaxi, a vehicle that consists of a motorcycle and a cabin for transporting passengers. Since he is well-known, he has a strong customer base that supports him and prefers his service.

Elmer wants to make some improvements to his vehicle, which is his work tool. He wants to buy some items that he needs to maintain his motorcycle in good condition and continue offering a good service. With the help of a loan, he hopes to increase his income and make some home improvements. For this reason, he has decided to request a loan of 1700 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to provide maintenance for his vehicle.

loans.name: Jose Eladio

texts.es:
José tiene 30 años de edad, es casado y vive junto a su familia La ciudad de Chiclayo capital del Departamento de Lambayeque.

Tiene junto a su esposa un puesto de venta de verduras. Todos los días ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de legumbres y tubérculos frescos los cuales adquiere em el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Este negocio es una fuente importante de ayuda a la família.
El negocio siempre cuenta con clientes que prefieren su buen trato y amabilidad. 

Él desea adquirir más mercadería, por ello há creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 700 nuevos soles. 

José es uma persona bastante trabajadora y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario.
texts.en:
José is 30 years old, married, and lives together with his family in the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque department.

José and his wife own a vegetable stall.  Every day they offer their customers a variety of fresh vegetables and tubers which they acquire in the wholesale market in the city of Chiclayo.  This business is an important source of help for their family.  The business always has loyal customers who prefer to buy from them because of their good customer service and kindness.

José would like to acquire more merchandise.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 700 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

José is a hard-working man who is committed to his family.  His biggest wish is to continue growing as a businessman.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 40 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos. Vive en casa propia,  en el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

La actividad que desarrolla el titular es la crianza de aves de corral pavos y gallinas contando los cuales engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local. Esta actividad la realizan desde hace más de 5 años en la parte posterior de su casa. 

Rosa desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la producción de sus animales y percibir mayores ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Rosa is 40 years old.  She lives with her partner and has four children.  She owns her own home in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Rosa's business is raising poultry such as turkey and hens which she fattens and then sells in her local market.  She keeps the animals in an area behind her home and has been in this business for more than five years.

Rosa would like to acquire balanced feed in order to improve her animal production and make more profits.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 800 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed

loans.name: Gilma Rosa

texts.es:
Gilma tiene 60 años D. edad, es casada,  vive en casa propia D. material rústico y no tiene hijos dependientes. Vive a 18 minutos D. la ciudad D. Mórrope, un distrito agrícola que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia D. Lambayeque, a más D. una hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo

GIlma se dedica  a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desD. hace mucho tiempo. Cría animales menores, especialmente ovejas, en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio. El los alimenta D. granos y pastos naturales, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentemente visitan la zona en donD. resiD.. 

Gilma desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Gilma es una persona bastante empeñosa y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Gilma is 60 years old, married, and lives in her own home which is maD. from rudimentary materials.  She does not have any dependent children.  Gilma lives 18 minutes from the city of Mórrope, in an agricultural district which is located in Lambayeque province, more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Gilma works in agriculture and has done so for a long time.  She raises animals, especially sheep, in some pens which are located near her home.  She feeds her animals on grain and natural fodder and when they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to the traders who frequently visit her area.

Gilma would like to acquire more animals and balanced feed to expand her business and make more income.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to help her achieve her goal.

Gilma is a determined and hard-working person.  Her biggest wish is to continue growing as a businesswoman so that she can improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her livestock

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel  tiene 26 años de edad que reside junto a su familia  el distrito de Lambayeque, ubicado a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales. Ella cría a sus animales en algunos ambientes situados en su domicilio, cuando ya ha desarrollado lo suficiente los ofrece en venta a los negociantes de la zona. Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de la economía.

Isabel desea adquirir alimento balanceado para su ganado. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Isabel is 26 years old and lives together with her family in Lambayeque district, 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque department.

Isabel raises and sells livestock.  She raises her animals on her property and, when they have reached a sufficient level of development, she offers them for sale to the traders in her area.  This activity allows her to help her family financially.

Isabel would like to acquire balanced feed for her livestock.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa with which she plans to achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed

loans.name: Deninsse Mabel

texts.es:
Deninsse tiene 30 años de edad, y reside junto a su família en el distrito de San Pedro de Lloc, una zona que se ha hecho conocida por la elaboración artesanal de sombreros tejidos a base de junco. El lugar se encuentra situado a 4 de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Desde hace 7 años tiene instalado en el mercado de abastos de su comunidad un puesto de venta de verduras. Todos los días ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de legumbres y tubérculos frescos los cuales adquiere em el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Este negocio es una fuente importante de ayuda a la família.   El negocio de Deninsse siempre cuenta con clientes que prefieren su buen trato y amabilidad. 

Ella desea adquirir más mercadería, por ello há creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles. 

Deninsse es una mujer bastante trabajadora y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria.
texts.en:
Deninsse is 30 years old and lives together with her family in San Pedro de Lloc district.  This is an area which has become well known for its production of handmade hats which are woven from reeds.

For seven years, Deninsse has had a vegetable stall in the food market in her community.  Every day she offers her customers a variety of fresh vegetables and tubers which she acquires in the wholesale market in the city of Chiclayo.  This business is an important source of help for her family.  Deninsse's business always has loyal customers who prefer to buy from her because of her good customer service and kindness.

Deninsse would like to acquire more merchandise.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Deninsse is a hard-working woman who is committed to her family.  Her biggest wish is to continue growing as a businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise

location.town: San Pedro de Lloc - Pacasmayo - La Libertad

loans.name: Iris Margot

texts.es:
Iris tiene 37 años de edad, es soltera y tiene dos 2 hijos, reside con su familia en el distrito de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la compra y venta de abarrotes, venta de artículos de tocador, actividad que viene ejerciendo desde hace mas de 5 años en forma continua, cuenta con local propio ubicado en el tercer sector del mercado Moshoqueque.
